data.actual_result: The formatting is incorrect in one of a couple different ways:
data.expected_result: The message should appear as sent.
data.short_description: Issue with formatting when "Automatically convert emoticons" is enabled
data.steps_to_repro: - Type and send a message consisting of these three things on different lines:- `<`- A web link- Anything represented as `<ID>` on Discord's end (a member or role ping, channel call, emoji, etc)
